messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Autism Spectrum kids and video games (was Re: Int...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/26/2005 9:09:14 PM Mountain Daylight Time, dezigna@comcast.net writes: Have you  considered turning this post into an article for Live
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/26/2005 9:09:14 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
dezigna@... writes:

Have you considered turning this post into an article for Live Free, Learn
Free or Life Learning Mag? It is beautifully expressed and very informative
too.




================

I liked it a lot and put it here:

_http://sandradodd.com/special/videogames_
(http://sandradodd.com/special/videogames)

(just in case people want to find it later)

and it it DOES become a magazine article (which would be cool), I could gush
mightily and brag it up on that page above and link to the whole finished
article. I can see it now...

And what I can really happily see is the dozens to hundreds and eventually
thousands of kids whose lives will be either just a little or extremely easier
and better. And because of that their siblings' and parents' lives will be
better.

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
